content.en: Sentiment analysis: Researchers have been exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to analyze public sentiment on Twitter during elections, improve sentiment analysis on the platform, and classify tweets about specific topics such as demonetization, global warming, and the COVID-19 pandemic. Various algorithms, including supervised machine learning techniques, Twitter opinion mining frameworks, and support vector machines, have been employed to accurately analyze sentiment in tweets. These studies highlight the potential of machine learning methods in understanding public sentiment on social media platforms.
content.da: Sentimentanalyse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at analysere offentlighedens holdninger på Twitter under valg, forbedre sentimentanalyse på platformen og klassificere tweets om specifikke emner som demonetisering, global opvarmning og COVID-19-pandemien. Forskellige algoritmer, herunder overvågede maskinlæringsteknikker, Twitter opinion mining-rammer og supportvektormaskiner, er blevet anvendt til præcist at analysere sentiment i tweets. Disse studier fremhæver potentialet for maskinlæringsmetoder i at forstå offentlighedens holdninger på sociale medieplatforme.
